CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: After cooling the substrate , a solution of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( or PC 70 BM ) mixture ( 1 : 2 w / w ) was spin - coated , where a blend of chloroform and o-dichlorobenzene ( 4 : 1 v / v ) was used as the solvent.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PDTP
2. DTDPP(Bu)
3. PCBM
4. PC 70 BM
5. Chloroform
6. o-dichlorobenzene
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PDTP
2. DTDPP(Bu)
3. PCBM
4. PC 70 BM

These are the four materials mentioned in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names. The other two entities, "chloroform" and "o-dichlorobenzene", are solvents and do not refer to material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Material Name" column:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM |
| PC 70 BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: After cooling the substrate , a solution of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( or PC 70 BM ) mixture ( 1 : 2 w / w ) was spin - coated , where a blend of chloroform and o-dichlorobenzene ( 4 : 1 v / v ) was used as the solvent.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. PCBM (or PC 70 BM)
3. 1 : 2 (w/w)
4. 4 : 1 (v/v)
5. chloroform
6. o-dichlorobenzene
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to Value of Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. 1 : 2 (w/w)
2. 4 : 1 (v/v)

These are the ratios of the weights or volumes of the materials being mixed, which are relevant to the properties of the resulting mixture.
